text: Hey Makara, the site tree feature is for CMS Pro+ accounts only. The app testing accounts are for letting users test out all the features of our system, thats why that is in the testing account.

So marketplace account need to upgrade to pro account to to have this feature?

I have done submit 1 of my theme to marketplace and i need to submit more. HubSpot should enable this feature for marketplace account.
I'll pass this feedback back to the team who owns this feature. I can see how this can benefit providers. Especially when you have multiple themes you are working with.
Thank you so much, I hope this feature available for marketplace accounts.
